messages.content: Hello,
Good morning/ Afternoon, this is (name) calling from Aventus Pay, is the owner of (BUSINESS) available?
yes speaking...

Ok great! I'm reaching out to you regarding a new federal policy that no longer requires business owners to pay processing fees when accepting credit and debit cards as forms of payment. Are you currently paying transaction fees when your business accepts credit and debit cards?
Yes...
Actually my manager is available right now and can explain how zero percent processing works... Can I transfer you now?
If yes, confirm owner's name and transfer.
If no, set appointment.
Ok awesome! Can I have your name just to make sure we address you properly?
(Owner's name)
Ok! Before I let you go, does your business process at least $5000 monthly in debit and credit card transactions?
Yes.

Perfect, lastly I would like to get a secondary phone number to contact you by, so that we are never tying up your business line while you are busy. Can I please get your cell number so that our senior account executives can contact you this way as well?
(secondary phone number)
Ok great! Thank you for taking time out to speak with me. My manager will be reaching out to you on (APPOINTMENT TIME)
Any agent can book 3 qualified appointments within 3 hours or get 5 qualified appointments booked on any given day.
Let's strive to be those agents who make the most of every last hour. With the right approach, we can turn any situation around.
The average ‘booked appointment’ has several ‘objections’ before you make a positive impression and book the appointment.
Overcoming objections is crucial; by staying positive and prepared with logical rebuttals, we're sure to make a lasting impression.
Negative energy is contagious, keep it to yourself and don’t be negative at all.
A positive mindset is powerful. Remember, a smile can be heard over the phone and can set the tone for a successful call.
An impression is made on every call, either you book a qualified appointment or you just got hung up on.
Each call is an opportunity. Even a hung up call is a chance to learn and improve for the next one.
Understand that you are offering a product that completely eliminates ALL of the merchant's processing fees.
Our product could be the solution merchants are looking for. It's about showing them the benefits that make a difference.
Bottom line in the field of ‘appointment setting’ success is stemmed from how strong your impression is.
First impressions count. Let's make sure every call starts strong and ends with a confident, welinformed presentation.
It is proven that the longer you keep the person on the phone, the greater your odds of selling.
Engagement is key. The longer we can hold a meaningful conversation, the closer we are to closing the deal.
3 qualified booked appointments a day minimum should be your goal when you walk in the door every day.
Persistence pays off. Let's aim for at least three qualified appointments every day to ensure we meet our goals.
Merchant services is an important part of the business...
Understanding these merchant service details can greatly impact your bottom line. Shall we explore how our services can provide you savings?
A merchant can email, fax, scan and send pics of a statement.
We provide 0% Credit Card processing services...
If you're interested in slashing your processing fees, let's set up a time to discuss how our 0% program can benefit you directly.
For the 0% Processing Program: Amount Submitted is $41,677.23, Fees Charged are $0.00...
EQUIPMENT OPTIONS available include Countertop Terminals, Wireless Terminals...
Can you tell me a bit about your current setup? This way, we can recommend which of our POS options will enhance your transaction process.
...POS Go are offered, each catering to specific requirements...
SCRIPT WORKFLOW includes: OPENING SCRIPT leading with an ASK;...
Based on our workflow, it seems we might need to discuss some of these steps in more detail. Would you like to go over any particular section?
Opening script
Hi, is this (Name of Business)?
Great, May I speak to the Owner (or the name on lead) please. (Ok, may I speak to someone that makes decisions on the merchant account please?)
Hi, my name is (agent name) calling from Aventus Pay. How are you today? You do still accept credit cards and debit cards at (name of business), correct?
Well, the reason we're giving you a call today is to let you know that there are some new regulations for all merchants that accept credit cards at their business's.
There's a new program that will allow you to process all credit cards and debit cards without having to pay any processing fees. It's called 0% processing and it will save you a fortune.
[If the response is positive, proceed to 'SET APPT SCRIPT']
[If the response is negative, go to 'REBUTTALS' (ADVANCED REBUTTALS) and ask (GOOD QUESTIONS)]
Set appointment script (APPT SCRIPT)
We have a Local Rep his name is (Reps names) in your area tomorrow meeting with business owners to explain how the 0% program works in detail, does morning or afternoon work better for you?
[Don't talk here until you get a direct answer from the merchant POSITIVE OR NEGATIVE]
[If the response is positive, proceed to 'QUALIFYING QUESTIONS']
[If the response is negative, go to 'REBUTTALS' (ADVANCED REBUTTALS) and ask (GOOD QUESTIONS)]
Main power line
If you pay more than 1% in processing fees with your current company, you should definitely take the appointment, give the agent (Agents name) 5 minutes of your time.
You can decide if the program is a good fit for the business after the presentation. It’s free of charge and there’s no obligation.
[If the response is positive, proceed to 'QUALIFYING QUESTIONS']
[If the response is negative, go to 'REBUTTALS' (ADVANCED REBUTTALS) and ask (GOOD QUESTIONS)]
Book Qualifying Questions
You're the owner that can make decisions on the merchant account, correct?
May I have your name so (REPS NAME) can address you correctly?
What kind of business is this? (OR) What do you guys do at (name of business)?
Your business is located at (business address), correct?
STATEMENT HOOK: Have your current processing statement with you at the time of appointment so you can follow along and (outside rep name) can show you how to pay zero processing fees!
You have a processing statement at your location, correct?
IF ANY OF THE QUALIFYING QUESTIONS HAVE BEEN IDENTIFIED EARLIER IN THE CONVERSATION DO NOT ASK GAIN
I'm not interested
Why not??? There is no obligation to see how much savings your business deserves.
If the response is positive, go to 'MAIN POWER LINE'
If the response is negative, go to 'REBUTTALS' (ADVANCED REBUTTALS) and ask (GOOD QUESTIONS)

This is not a sales call. I am following up on your interest in saving money for your business. I am offering a Win Win scenario to show you not only how much can be saved on your processing costs but potentially eliminating the fees altogether.
